name: Sir Ababol: Remastered Edition
overview: Sir Ababol: Remastered Edition is an updated release of the 2013 NES homebrew title Sir Ababol. This release improves the original game by correcting a number of map bugs and imperfections. It also adds new colours and tweaks the movement to optimize it and make it more responsive. By completing the game two additional playable characters can be unlocked. Completing it once unlocks Zazelle and a second time Johnny Limite. They each have different moves providing different gameplay.
